items.name: Amazon RDS
items.description: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) is a managed database service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS).

items.name: Amazon Keyspaces
items.description: Amazon Keyspaces is a managed Apache Cassandra-compatible database service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS).

items.name: Amazon ElastiCache
items.description: Amazon ElastiCache is a managed in-memory data store and cache service offered by Amazon Web Services (AWS).  It acts as a high-speed layer between your application and database, storing frequently accessed data in memory for quicker retrieval.
